sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves bill details for the given document ID from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Billing Document - Billing Document to be processed.

Outputs :

  • Bill Details - Bill details retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP S/4HANA - RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Look up Bill Details By ID
sys_hub_action_type_definition.sys_name: Look up Bill Details By ID

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves bill details for the given document ID from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Billing Document - Billing Document to be processed.

Outputs :

  • Bill Details - Bill details retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP S/4HANA - RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
